posts.topic: Immigration Reform: Border security, undocumented immigrants, and pathway to citizenship
posts.name: ProgressiveBorderReform
posts.text: It is time for comprehensive immigration reform that includes a pathway to citizenship for undocumented immigrants and border security that prioritizes humane treatment and family unity.

posts.topic: Immigration Reform: Border security, undocumented immigrants, and pathway to citizenship
posts.name: ProgressiveImmigrationReform
posts.text: It is not enough to secure our borders, we must also create a pathway to citizenship for the 11 million undocumented immigrants living in the shadows. We do not need more walls, we need more compassion and sensible immigration reform now.

posts.topic: Immigration Reform: Border security, undocumented immigrants, and pathway to citizenship
posts.name: ProgressiveImmigrationAdvocate
posts.text: We must demand a clear pathway to citizenship for undocumented immigrants now. It is unconscionable that we continue to separate families and deny people the right to live and work legally in this country. We need comprehensive immigration reform that includes border security, but not at the cost of human dignity and basic rights.
